brief: Winter Olympics heat up: Biathlon mixed relay today, Johaug and Klaebo chase gold tomorrow
Arsenal extend lead to six points with City stumbling; Liverpool visit Sunderland Wednesday
Hovland tees off Thursday at Pebble Beach after missing Phoenix cut

radar: Viktor Hovland begins his Pebble Beach campaign Thursday after a disappointing Phoenix finish. Casper Ruud's next tournament TBD following Olympic festivities. Magnus Carlsen's Candidates Tournament starts late March in Toronto ‚Äî the road to another world title shot begins soon.
